```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const track = document.getElementById("hs-track");
  if (!track) return;

  const prev  = document.querySelector(".hs-prev");
  const next  = document.querySelector(".hs-next");
  const dotsC = document.getElementById("hs-dots");
  const slides = Array.from(track.querySelectorAll(".hs-slide"));

  let index = 0;
  let rafId = null;

  function goTo(i, smooth = true) {
    index = (i + slides.length) % slides.length;
    const left = slides[index].offsetLeft;
    track.scrollTo({ left, behavior: smooth ? "smooth" : "auto" });
    updateDots();
  }

  function updateDots() {
    if (!dotsC) return;
    dotsC.querySelectorAll("button").forEach((b, i) => {
      b.setAttribute("aria-current", i === index ? "true" : "false");
    });
  }

  // Dots
  if (dotsC) {
    dotsC.innerHTML = slides.map((_, i) =>
      `<button type="button" class="hs-dot" aria-label="Ir al slide ${i+1}" aria-current="${i===0}"></button>`
    ).join("");

    dotsC.querySelectorAll("button").forEach((b, i) => {
      b.addEventListener("click", () => goTo(i));
    });
  }

  // Flechas
  prev?.addEventListener("click", () => goTo(index - 1));
  next?.addEventListener("click", () => goTo(index + 1));

  // Cuando haces scroll con mouse/touch, detectar slide visible y actualizar dots
  function onScroll() {
    if (rafId) cancelAnimationFrame(rafId);
    rafId = requestAnimationFrame(() => {
      const x = track.scrollLeft + track.clientWidth / 2;
      let best = 0, bestDist = Infinity;

      slides.forEach((s, i) => {
        const mid = s.offsetLeft + s.clientWidth / 2;
        const d = Math.abs(mid - x);
        if (d < bestDist) { bestDist = d; best = i; }
      });

      index = best;
      updateDots();
    });
  }
  track.addEventListener("scroll", onScroll, { passive: true });

  // Recalcular al cambiar tama√±o
  window.addEventListener("resize", () => goTo(index, false));

  // Init
  goTo(0, false);
});
</script>
```
